main.name: Draw
main.description: `Game.Draw` holds all the drawing logic of the Game, provided by a `Draw` plugin. The API is free to implement by the plugin, but one thing is required: the `Init` function, which returns the DOM element on which the Game will be displayed.

children.name: Init
children.description: Initialize the Draw object. Called when Game inits. Returns the DOM element on which the Game will be drawn. Required.
